Module jtrim.property
Package org.jtrim2.property

Interface PropertyPublisher<ValueType>

Type Parameters:
ValueType - the type of the value to be published
public interface PropertyPublisher<ValueType>
Defines a method which protects a value when that value is being returned. That is, this interface is intended to be used in situations like when a value to be returned is mutable and must be copied, so that clients might not alter the internal value.

This interface was designed to be used with a PropertySource which might use this interface before returning the property by its getValue method.

Thread safety

Instances of this interface are required to be completely thread-safe without any further synchronization.

Synchronization transparency

Methods of this interface are required to be synchronization transparent and may be called from any context.
See Also:

  • PropertyFactory.constSource
  • PropertyFactory.memProperty

    Modifier and Type

    ValueType
    returnValue(ValueType value)
    Creates the value to be returned from the passed value.

  • Method Details

    • returnValue

      ValueType returnValue(ValueType value)
      Creates the value to be returned from the passed value. This method might make a defensive copy of the passed value or simply return the passed value if it is immutable or cannot be abused.
      Parameters:
      value - the value on which the result of the method is based. This argument may or may not be null depending on the implementation.
      Returns:
      the value to be returned to the client code. This is usually the defensive copy of the value passed in the argument. This method may or may not return null depending on the implementation.
